create.title: Route Creation
create.description: The route builder allows you to create and save a set of tourist attractions in Belarus with a starting and ending location of the trip. It provides visual route display, time and distance calculation, automatic optimization functionality, and export to navigator.

edit.title: Route Editing
edit.description: The route builder allows you to create and save a set of tourist attractions in Belarus with a starting and ending location of the trip. It provides visual route display, time and distance calculation, automatic optimization functionality, and export to navigator.

create.success: Route was successfully saved. You can view it in your personal account

update.success: Route was successfully updated. You can view it in your personal account
